verses.name: Matthew 13:54
verses.text: And when he was come into his own country, he taught them in their synagogue, insomuch that they were astonished, and said, Whence hath this man this wisdom, and these mighty works?

verses.name: Matthew 13:55
verses.text: Is not this the carpenter’s son? is not his mother called Mary? and his brethren, James, and Joses, and Simon, and Judas?

verses.name: Matthew 13:56
verses.text: And his sisters, are they not all with us? Whence then hath this man all these things?

verses.name: Matthew 13:57
verses.text: And they were offended in him. But Jesus said unto them, A prophet is not without honour, save in his own country, and in his own house.
